It's a prototype writing by scala. the syntax is not very rigid, for example the sampler is defined like this: void tex ï¼š fs0(mipmap,mirror).  Any one who is interested can modify it in your own way. 


Example:

float44 view : vc0

float44 model : vc

float44 proj : vc2


float4 position : va0

float4 vertexColor : va1

float4 texcoord : va2


float4 fragmentColor : v0

float4 fragTexCoord : v1

void tex1 : fs0(mipmap, mirror)


void vertexMain()

{

  fragmentColor = vertexColor

  op = mul(mul(mul(position, model), view), proj)

  fragTexCoord = texcoord

}


void fragmentMain()

{

  oc = fragmentColor + tex2d(fragTexCoord, tex1)

  kil(oc)

}


generated code :

vertex shader:

move v0, va1

mul vt1,va0,vc1

mul vt0,vt1,vc0

mul op,vt0,vc2

move v1, va2


fragment shader:

tex2d ft0,v1,fs0<mipmap,mirror>

add oc,v0,ft0

kil oc
